6.63: Reduced  Empower cooldown from 12 to 7. Increased  Reverse Polarity stun duration from 2/3/4 to 2.5/3.25/4.
6.60: Reduced  Reverse Polarity cooldown from 120 to 120/110/100. Reduced attack point from 0.56 to 0.5.
6.61: Reverse Polarity now pulls units 120-170 range infron tof Magnus, instead of randomly around him.
6.67: Removed from Captain's Mode Reworked  Empower:
6.42: Reduced  Reverse Polarity cooldown from 120/160/160 to 120 on each level.
6.69: Added to Captain's Mode. Increased  Skewer damage from 50/100/150/200 to 70/140/210/280.
6.04: Reduced  Reverse Polarity cooldown from 120/160/200 to 120/160/160.
6.52: Reduced  Reverse Polarity radius from 500 to 410.
6.50: Increased  Reverse Polarity cooldown from 120/100/80 to 120 on each level.
6.35: Increased base armor from 0 to 2 (total armor is now 4.1).
6.38: Increased  Shockwave travel distance from 600 to 700.
6.72d: Undid melee hero collision change from 6.72c
6.10: Changed  Shockwave hotkey from E to W. Changed  Empower hotkey from W to E.  Reverse Polarity no longer moves Roshan (still stuns and damages).
6.78: Reduced  Reverse Polarity damage from 150/225/300 to 50/125/200.
6.72c: Melee hero collision size now reduced from 24 to 12.
6.75: Increased  agility gain from 1.8 to 2.5. Increased  Empower attack damage bonus and cleave damage from 15%/25%/35%/45% to 20%/30%/40%/50%. Increased  Skewer slow duration from 2 to 2.5.
6.74: Increased  Skewer cast range from 800 to global. This means Magnus will charge towards the targeted point for up to 800 range when targeting beyond the max distance.
6.77: Skewer Can no longer drag spell immune enemies. Reduced max travel distance from 1200 to 600/800/1000/1200. Reduced  Reverse Polarity stun duration from 2.5/3.25/4 to 2.25/3/3.75.
6.76: Shockwave Increased travel distance from 700 to 1000. Reduced cooldown from 11/10/9/8 to 10/9/8/7.  Skewer Increased unit search radius from 95 to 125. Increased max travel distance from 800 to 1200. Can now only drag heroes, instead of any enemy unit.
6.73: Increased  Empower duration from 30 to 40. Reduced  Skewer cooldown from 35 to 30.
6.72: Reduced cast point from 0.51 to 0.3. Increased attack range from 100 to 128. Increased  Empower cast range from 500 to 800. Increased  Skewer max drag targets from 2 to 1/2/3/4.
6.81: Skewer Removed 1/2/3/4 targets drag limit. Increased max travel distance from 600/800/1000/1200 to 750/900/1050/1200.
6.82: Empower Is no longer dispelled by spell immunity. Increased manacost from 40 to 30/40/50/60.
6.83: Empower can now be cast on spell immune allies.
6.44b: Reverse Polarity Reduced manacost from 200/275/400 to 200/250/300. Reduced cooldown from 120 to 120/100/80.
6.20: Reduced  Shockwave manacost from 100/120/140/160 to 110 on each level.  Empower Reduced attack damage bonus from 20%/40%/60%/80% to 15%/30%/45%/60%. Rescaled manacost from 25/30/40/65 to 30 on each level.
6.48b: Increased  Reverse Polarity cooldown from 120/100/80 to 120/110/100.
